message: Bagged or loose? If you drink loose tea, what do you use to infuse?

I've got an IngenuiTEA that I use, and also a single cup metal basket. When I travel, I keep unbleached pouches full of my staple teas so I don't have to drink the crap they normall have in hotels/conference centers/etc...
I have a mug infuser much like this: http://www.uptontea.com/shopcart/item.asp?from=justForYou-bestsellers.asp&itemID=AS31&begin=0

At home I use one of these: http://bit.ly/g3JasQ, and at work I use one of these: http://bit.ly/ghkQ3Z.  That covers my bases pretty well 99% of the time, but I do need to figure out something like @rkalajian's self-bundled pouches for travel -- the bagged CTC stuff you find on the road is a major bummer.
90% of the time I use loose tea in the IngenuiTEA.  I have both sizes of the IngenuiTEA.  If I do use bagged tea, it's usually the non-paper satchel type.
@travhimself Just search Google for unbleached tea filters. I have the ones from Adagio, but I've since found cheaper ones on Amazon.
